entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain. High 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
